extendedInfo.description: Create and share your own Disney Memories with an official app from Disney!â¢	Use this FREE app to decorate your photos with Disney magicâ¢	Pose with some of your favorite Disney charactersâ¢	Add a Disney Parks themed filter, frame, or sticker â¢	Easily share your photos with friends and family via email, Facebook, or Twitterâ¢	Come back everyday to enjoy a Disney Time Photo of the Day for a glimpse into the beauty of Disney Parksâ¢	Set themed alarm clocks and see your favorite Disney Pals come to life with audio and video greetingsTerms of Use: http://disneytermsofuse.com/

reviews.comment: Amesome i love it but i only get mickey and rapunzel and every time u want to edit it the characters arnt other than that luv
reviews.author: Ezequiel Aguilera

reviews.title: This isn\'t ready yet.
reviews.comment: This app is not a complete thought yet. You should offer this as Disney, but get the whole idea together. If this is the whole idea, hi, I\'m Dawn. Hire me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless if I cannot save pics
reviews.comment: This is a very cool app, I have been making great pics of my gaily Ferrin a recent Disney trip. Unfortunately I get an error every time I try to save a picture.
reviews.author: Jeremy Pollard

reviews.title: The best Disney editing app.
reviews.comment: Helps me edit pictures into extraordinary pictures with Disney touches. Lags a little bit but overall it works flawlessly.
reviews.author: Ramon Ilog

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Cool app i will give it five stars
reviews.author: Malik Khalid

reviews.title: Cute but lame.
reviews.comment: Editing options were few and lame and it kept crashing. Cute idea but not very fun.
reviews.author: Kelsey Weigel

reviews.title: Love it but... Previous version worked better with photos
reviews.comment: Please fix! when I upload photos they come out pixel like. and I know my phone is not the problem. the previous version of this app use to work just fine with all my pictures even the low quality ones. I love everything else the filter and frames are awesome! I do miss some of the old frames though.
reviews.author: Janet Castaneda

reviews.title: Needs lion king
reviews.comment: Really needs some lion king characters for my daughter, not rating 5 star yet because I haven\'t actually taken any pics yet but good idea so here\'s a 4
reviews.author: Tim Matheson

reviews.title: Fun App
reviews.comment: This app is cute and easy to use. All it needs are some frames for the Disney cruise line.
reviews.author: Shannon Maples

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: You people are awsome
reviews.author: agnes wambui

reviews.title: Cuts if the right half of my pictures
reviews.comment: For some reason this app keeps cutting off the right half if ask my pictures and actually copying the left half so it\'s there twice.  Very weird and I don\'t know how to fix it.
reviews.author: Katie Barlow

reviews.title: Needs to work out some bugs
reviews.comment: I am able to take photos, but sometimes it freezes when I try to edit, or sometimes it freezes when I try to save them. It works successfully maybe 1 time out of 6.
reviews.author: Kierra Warnken

reviews.title: Alarms? What Alarms?
reviews.comment: Well when you set the alarms to come on, they just show a screen saying to dismiss the alarm or view the alarm there\'s no audible alarm whatsoever.
reviews.author: Matthew Beard

reviews.title: A great app for all.
reviews.comment: You can edit your specular moments in disney.
reviews.author: Blake Berkowitz

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: i love it its really great and awesome

reviews.title: Cute but
reviews.comment: The update should have more options

reviews.comment: Love it it\'s amazing!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Regret updating the app!!!
reviews.comment: i regret updating the app!!!!! It loses all the lovely frames. Is there a way to restore to the previous version? I\'m very sad now.
reviews.author: Elaine Wu

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app. It\'s awesome :)
reviews.author: Brian Arbizu

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t worked once. Otherwise great idea. LG Nexus 4
